overview: Rica, the most popular adult actress, lived in harmony with her good-known accountant husband after retiring as an adult actress, but has a feeling of sorry for him in one heart.  Rica likes her husband as a man, but is unsatisfied with sex and has a soulless sex.  Then one day, a friend Miyo came home and recommended a comeback, and Rika refused...
tagline: Her secret past, a secret for her husband.
title: Her Ecstatic Eyes
